message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor,  since I'll be taking the first hit on inflation.  What do you think?
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, especially considering the inflation. How about a 55/45 split with me getting the slightly larger share?
Okay, I'm willing to be more flexible.  Let's go with a 55/45 split in my favor. We need to work together to make sure we both get something in the end!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money with every round that passes. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
